summary: A small modification to Rorikstead, and a player home!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ffff][size=6]ClefJ's Rorikstead[/size][/color]

We can all admit that Rorikstead, as the first town to come out of a man's mouth is pretty underwhelming. And indeed, there are some wonderful Rorikstead mods already out there! Superior Rorikstead and JK's work are marvelous in their own right. But, I still wanted something... Smaller. More homey. No massive walls or city gates, nothing that makes it bigger than Riverwood. This is for the player that would like a town mod that makes it look like it would've been there in the original game. There is no blacksmith in town, since the innkeep has to go to Whiterun to get his son some armor. Hopefully there's enough room in people's games to accomodate a tiny mod like this!

[color=#00ff00]What this adds: [/color]
- Hearthfire items, such as carrots and chimneys and ovens, etc.
- The woven fences have for the most part been replaced with stone fences, giving it a real Scottish feel.
- Minor details inspired by JK's work, such as small barns!
- A new player home, a water-pump mill (the key is in the boss skull bowl at Bleakwind Bluff)!
- A new merchant abode, Generally Good Goods, with 3 new npc's.
- A small lake behind the inn, as well as an apple orchard.
- Oak trees, thanks to [color=#00ff00]Hoddminir[/color].
- Harvestable apple trees, thanks to [color=#00ff00]ChickenDownUnder[/color].
- Static food containers, thanks to [color=#00ff00]Blary[/color].
- Custom bed meshes and textures, thanks to [color=#00ff00]Mirrou4ka[/color].
- Cleaned with TES5Edit! Some navmesh modification has occured, of course.
- Common furniture upgraded to Upper in Rorik's Manor.
I may add more flora or modify the tavern interior in the future!

[color=#ff0000]Requirements:[/color]
- Hearthfire
-Update

[color=#ff0000]Incompatibilities:[/color]
-Any major exterior mod to Rorikstead.[/center]
author: ClefJ
